title: CURATED SNOW
description: CURATED SNOW - is an extensive sound library containing 103 unique files of Snow (Storms, Movement, Impacts, Friction, Handling, Crashes, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions.
longDescription: CURATED SNOW - is an extensive sound library containing 103 unique files of Snow (Storms, Movement, Impacts, Friction, Handling, Crashes, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions ranging from city streets, parks, forests, wood and cement to shoveling, scrapping, and brushing. All of our libraries comply with the Universal Category System metadata naming convention standard. Files are presented in 44.1 kHz / 16 bit (VIDEO GAME).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  103 Unique .wav files of Snow in various environments and conditions.
  •  Universal Category System metadata file naming standard.
  •  Royalty-Free.

Number of Audio Waves: 103

Number of Audio Cues: 103

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 87

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CNmRTu4OpjjLewy0dFqk5lC2kpGBG-Ut/view?usp=share_link

Demo: https://soundcloud.com/sound-assets/curated-snow-demo?si=c00806b7e793414886993611cd7c1281&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
